channel.title: Port Is Not Open!
channel.description: Guys..i'm tired of making server's and get fail over all...i dont know how to portforwarding..my freind tollded me to use utorrent i did ..but it say PORT IS NOT OPEN !!! HOW TO MAKE IT OPEN !! :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad:

item.title: Port Is Not Open!
item.dc:creator: @emtrescue emtrescue
item.description:
@emtrescue wrote:

I suggest a VPS, all VPS have all ports open, ofc besides RCD, Web, and some have mysql closed.

You will need to shut off all firewalls, enabe downloading on IE disable all security download your favorite browser, upload your server and download it on the VPS you will need to learn how to redirect your run.bat files, very easy to learn if you look at your compiler, you will need to download java, jdk and jre

dewlance.com is the cheapest VPS’ they ahve one for only 12 bucks a month will hold up to 20 players first month or two if you get more than 20 people than you must be something really right. lol.

it will take a couple months to get people coming regularly than once that happens and people start laggying out you will hopefully have enough donations to buy the next step up. GL

Read full topic

item.title: Port Is Not Open!

item.description:
@mrpyro3 wrote:

I recommend using a program called “simple port forwarding”. It’s easy to use and portforwards for you
